@GaryDunne A little off the beaten track but Lacken in Co Mayo is a firm favourite of mine. Just outside of Killala and Ballina, the beaches are beautiful, it’s really remote and there are lots of fab drives/scenary nearby! 2nd suggestion: Gggalway!🤗

@Mike_Douglas_ @MentalHealth_Hr @MHFAIreland @MHFAEngland I found it really useful for discussion around topics like suicide, self harm, psychosis and other terminology not used in day to day conversations. It enabled me to know what to do when speaking to someone who was feeling suicidal. Everyone should train in it! #mentalhealthhour

@MentalHealth_Hr I completed a 2 day course in "Mental Health First Aid" @MHFAIreland @MHFAEngland that I thought was extremely useful at helping me to have the conversations around suicide, self harm and supporting mental health. Highly recommend! #mentalhealthhour

@Mathieunorry @TonyRobbins I heard about this! Thankfully the Unleash the Power within event I attended did not include any controversy of this sort; a fantastic event for self development and change!

This is the week to get it done! July is a new month and marks the second half of 2018. This week challenge yourself to be proactive; reply to that email, research that info, go for that walk,book that trip. Whatever it is,stop excuses&decide NOW is a good time🤩#mondaymotivation https://t.co/jpIgEE8W69
